title: Crew Show (Driving the AMG Black Series, Lucid Air, rally, Q&A) - TST Podcast #685
description:
We've driven a lot in the last week. Matt and Zack drove the Lucid Air, then went on the Coastal Range Rally, putting 800 miles on the AMG GT Black Series and Zack's M3. Plus, we talk to listeners about Phaeton problems, 718 GT4 sedans, finding a lost car, and what we would build for $15,000.

 

Watch our new series!

https://youtu.be/AIncQODpC8s 

 

Go to HelloFresh.com/smokingtire14 and use code smokingtire14 for up to 14 free meals and 3 free gifts!

 

Visit talkspace.com and get $100 off your first month when you use promo code TIRE at sign-up.

 

Register for an account at Stance.com and get 15% off your first purchase. Use promo code TIRE at checkout to apply.

 

Find Valvoline now at your local auto parts store.

 

Want to watch the live stream, get ad-free podcasts, or exclusive podcasts? Join our Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/thesmokingtirepodcast
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
